about_the_game:
This bonus content is automatically added to everyone who purchases the game in Early Access. It will not be available after the game leaves Early Access.

The DLC grants the player the following items at the start:

Skill Stone - This item is required for upgrading abilities in the skill menu.
Fireball Ring - Grants a magical ring that allows the creation of a fireball using mana. Unlike single-use scrolls, the ring will stay with you permanently.
Lizard Head Trophy - A wall decoration for your home.
